content: Hi, is there an admin mechanism to reset a Guest user password when the guest has lost theirs?
Side note - we are using LDAP for our non-guest users - the reset password link on the login screen has never worked for us.

You can use ./manage.py send_password_reset_email to send a password reset mail to the guest user.
My Login page does not even show a password reset button with only having ldap enabled. I think Zulip does never really write to LDAP. Only read
